name: Micro Canyon
description:
Introduction

Typically accessed via Ladder Canyon, Micro Canyon features a short, beautiful stretch of non-technical narrows. Todd Martins trip description has you go up the narrows, but I wished I had gone from top down instead.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
